page.title: Car Servicing
page.seoTitle: Car Servicing In Sydney and NSW | Motorserve
page.seoDescription: Visit one of our Motorserve service centres across NSW and ACT today for expert car servicing and repairs.

textField.cardGridHeading: Read more about our top products
textField.cardGridText: Not what you're looking for? We also offer specialty services, repairs, vehicle inspections and insurance services.

cards.title: Roadworthy inspections (NSW & ACT)
cards.description: We can provide NSW Pinkslips and ACT Roadworthy Inspections.

image.alt: motorserve mechanic in workshop next to silver car

cards.title: Logbook service
cards.description: Motorserve is an authorised logbook service provider. We conduct logbook services to to manufacturers specifications so your vehicle warranty is maintained.

image.alt: motorserve mechanic inspecting car in workshop

cards.title: Essential service
cards.description: Routine for us, convenient for you. Recommended for cars every 6 months.

image.alt: mechanic shining light under hood of silver car

icons.iconText: From regular car servicing to major repairs, we have the right equipment and expertise.
A large network of car servicing locations across NSW and ACT means we’ve got a convenient location to suit you.
Most parts and repairs come with a warranty of 12 months or 20,000km°.
We have great prices and get your approval on all work. Plus, NRMA Members save 10%^

children.text: From logbook servicing to major repairs, our qualified mechanics at Motorserve go that extra mile to make sure your vehicle is as safe as possible for you and your loved ones. What’s more, you can rest easy that they're taking hygiene very seriously, which means your vehicle will be thoroughly cleaned before and after we work on it.
Motorserve has been proudly helping Australians since 2007. When you visit any of our service stores across NSW and ACT, you’ll receive great care and attention every time. Plus, as an
, you’ll receive a 10% discount off car servicing^.
Find out more about the importance of regularly servicing your car from the video below.

bannerMessage.title: 10% off car servicing for NRMA members

children.text: We'll get you back on the road. When you visit any of our car servicing stores across NSW and ACT, you’ll receive great care and attention every time. Plus, as an NRMA Member, you’ll receive a 10% discount off car servicing^.

image.alt: older couple looking out over fields at sunset

page.comparisonFooterCopy: Pricing of a Logbook or Essential service can vary depending on the year, make and model of the vehicle and the work required, please contact us for a quote. NRMA members receive a 10% discount.
